remarks: Lemma for ~ hsmex .  The core induction, establishing bounds on the order types of iterated unions of the initial set.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 14-Feb-2015.)
statement:
hsmexlem4.x $e |- X e. _V $.
hsmexlem4.h $e |- H = ( rec ( ( z e. _V |-> ( har ` ~P ( X X. z ) ) ) , ( har ` ~P X ) ) |` _om ) $.
hsmexlem4.u $e |- U = ( x e. _V |-> ( rec ( ( y e. _V |-> U. y ) , x ) |` _om ) ) $.
hsmexlem4.s $e |- S = { a e. U. ( R1 " On ) | A. b e. ( TC ` { a } ) b ~<_ X } $.
hsmexlem4.o $e |- O = OrdIso ( _E , ( rank " ( ( U ` d ) ` c ) ) ) $.
hsmexlem4 $p |- ( ( c e. _om /\ d e. S ) -> dom O e. ( H ` c ) ) $.
$d H a c d $.
$d S c d $.
$d U c d $.
$d X a b z $.
$d a b c d x y z $.
